Reviews.Title: “Cramped bathroom! We dreaded using it!”

Reviews.Content: didnt hotel rio consisted 3 properties located 3 buildings near booked found booking 2 star property hotel located building reception left hotel building decent bathroom terrible cramped toilet bowl front tiny sink literally wash hands brush teeth sitting toilet bowl fit inside bathroom heavy sink tiny wasnt catch falling water wash floor wet shower shower curtain stick floor wash dreaded using bathroom couldnt wait check bathroom looked newly renovated toilet bowl sink shower grout unsightly streaks fyi instead providing towels white sheets texture table cloth table napkin weird actually job guess ok hotel bathroom youre low maintenance recommend hotel friends im hotels

Reviews.Title: “Central location, but I can't believe I paid *that* much...”
Reviews.Author: CAHoya
Reviews.Content: stayed friends weekend trip venice ill admit concerned trip wasnt paying attention venice accommodations surprised arrived discover exactly paying record paid 200 euros night 3 people paying guess id little luxe money alley building yorker self doors restaurant kitchens bustling people building slightly renovated recently newish fake hardwood floors newish ikea furniture closets 3person king sized bed twin twin cot folded footstool bedding closet im honestly pull cot walk bathroom facilities clean impossible shower shower curtain hugging laughed towels theyre material table cloths job reviews noted near attractions cant beat location time id willing stay little beaten path oh note people venice walking city moment hauling own luggage ferrys bridges stairs ive happy packed lightly

Reviews.Title: “Average place in a GREAT location”
Reviews.Author: BRA_BNE
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights busy staying building explore city comfortably 5 piazza quiet bed private bathroom entrance wasnt inviting price location cares venice dont stay hotel option perfect paid 60 euros double ensuite real bargain venice especially close san marco square wouldn twice venice definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “so cheap with an amazing location”

Reviews.Content: loved hotel rio clean quiet tucked street bustling square didnt wifi tv claimed booked hours didnt difference tablecloth towels strange wed prepared towels reading reviews expensive city venice hotel rio real probably honeymooners base explore city st marks five minute stroll
